import React from 'react'; import {api} from '../utils/Api' export default function Main({handleEditAvatar, handleAddPlace, handleEditProfile}) { const [userName, setUserName] = React.useState(); const [userDescription, setUserDescription] = React.useState(); const [userAvatar, setUserAvatar] = React.useState(); React.useEffect(() => { Promise.all([ api.getUserInfo(), ]) .then(([user]) => { setUserName(user.name); setUserDescription(user.about); setUserAvatar(user.avatar) }) }) return (
 

{userName}

{userDescription}

); }
